mapper.insert: insert into t_address (province_id, city_id, area_id, biz_code, address_detail, phone_number, context_name, user_id) values (#{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bizCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contextName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_address set province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, biz_code = #{bizCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_detail = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context_name = #{contextName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.user_id as "userId", p.province as "provinceName", c.city as "cityName", ar.area as "areaName", a.address_detail as "addressDetail", a.context_name as "contextName", a.phone_number as "phoneNumber" from t_address a LEFT JOIN provinces p on a.province_id = p.provinceid LEFT JOIN cities c on a.city_id = c.cityid LEFT JOIN areas ar on a.area_id = ar.areaid where user_id = #{userId}
